description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe defining the build configuration, dependencies, package information, and installation steps for Bluez 5.45, a Linux Bluetooth stack. It specifies dependencies, package options, patches, sources, and build instructions specific to this version of Bluez.

methods.name: get_noinst_tools_paths
methods.description: Function to generate paths for non-installed tools based on NOINST_TOOLS variable.

methods.name: do_compile_ptest
methods.description: Build step to compile tests using make.
